heading: Appropriations and expenditures.
general-note: Use as a topical subdivision under names of countries, cities, etc., individual legislative bodies, and military services. Also use under names of individual government agencies and institutions for works on their financial affairs. Under names of individual nongovernmental corporate bodies, use the subdivision. Finance. for works on their budgets and the raising and expenditure of funds. Also use the subdivision. Finance. under individual government bodies for works limited to their management of nonappropriated funds..
